Package net.middell.combo

YUI-compatible utilities for creating resource combos, e.g.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
TextResource A text-based resource to be delivered via HTTP.
TextResourceCombo An ordered sequential combination of text-based resources.
TextResourceResolver Maps paths, specified e.g. in a URL, to text-based resources located in the filesystem.
 

Package net.middell.combo Description

YUI-compatible utilities for creating resource combos, e.g. CSS/JavaScript rollups.

In order to minizime round-trip times between web servers and clients, external resources (e. g. JavaScript and CSS files) are combined on the server-side and delivered as a single resource. Frameworks like Yahoo's YUI support this best practice.

This package provides utility classes to retrieve text-based resources from a configurable set of directories in the server filesystem, concatenate them to a single “resource combo” and jointly provide them for streaming, e.g. to a servlet response stream, a file cache etc.).

Rudimentary support is implemented for rewriting links to external resources within the combined ones, e.g. url() constructs in CSS resources.

Author:
Gregor Middell
